It doesn\'t speak when there is a call or sms ?

Check the speech volume in the Volume setting of the app. Also If ringer volume is silent, there will be no speech. Furthermore Spoken caller name has two settings to enable disable speech [Enable call alert] and []Enable sms alert], these settings should be checked to ensure the relevant speech is made. If the mentioned settings are correct but still there is no speech then you should ensure that Text to speech engine is installed in your mobile. By default text to speech engine is installed on android systems. click the button below to check if TTS is installed correctly
Is there a way to silent the speech when I pick up the phone ?

There is a setting named [quite on turn] in the common section. If you enable this setting you will be able to stop the speech when it is in progress. For example if there is an SMS being read out and you just want to make it quite. All you do is flip your phone in any direction and the speech will stop, similarly you can stop the speech for incoming call but the mentioned setting should be checked for this feature to work
Is is possible to turn off ringtone and just listen to speech ?
Yes, You should select [silent ringtone] from Settings -> Sound -> Phone ringtone

If you find that your problem remains unresolved, then please let the problem occur a few times (or make it happen) and then immediately come back to this screen. Fill in your name, email and describe the problem and click the send log button. Internet connection is required for the log file to be sent
Set the volume for call and sms speech currently set to %
Tap here to stop the speech
Text to speech engine is not installed on your system or perhaps your sd card is unavailable. speech engine is required for the app to work
